mapper.select: SELECT b.code billCode, b.created billCreated, b.operation_time operationTime, b.modified billModified, b.operator_name operatorName, b.detect_status, b.product_name productName, b.name, b.weight, b.weight_unit weightUnit, b.origin_name originName, b.verify_status , b.plate, b.bill_type, b.origin_certifiy_url originCertifiyUrl, b.truck_type, b.brand_name, b.brand_id, b.spec_name, b.latest_detect_record_id, b.source_name tallyAreaNo, b.arrival_datetime, up.name upStreamName, d.* FROM detect_request d JOIN register_bill b ON d.id = b.detect_request_id LEFT JOIN upstream up ON up.id = b.upstream_id where d.id=#{id}
